rooms.description: An inviting entrance with Art Deco motifs and a vestibule.
Spacious living area featuring elegant geometric patterns typical of Art Deco design. Vastu-aligned towards the south-east direction for positive energy.
Modern dining space with ornamental decor that complements the overall Art Deco theme. Placed adjacent to living room.
Private and luxurious master bedroom designed as a bachelor pad retreat with subtle art deco detailing. Vastu-aligned for calm and energy balance.
Comfortable guest room offering an aesthetic mix of vintage and modern decor in keeping with the Art Deco style.
Functional area for work or study, incorporating Art Deco elements like streamlined furniture and geometric patterns.
